thread.section_title: Viceroy Central Park New York - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great hotel... one minor issue
thread.title_full: Great hotel... one minor issue - Review of Viceroy Central Park New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: DROJC
title: Great hotel... one minor issue
text:
Stayed here for two nights on business.
I love the hotel. It has a very cool vibe. I don't often eat at hotel restaurants but did here and it was worth it.
Location is great. Staff seemed nice. My only complaint was the smell. Don't get me wrong, its not a bad smell, its a flowery perfume or fragrance of some sort that is nice... at first. You notice it right away when you walk into the lobby but it stays with you. After a while it was mildly annoying and I was worried it would attach to me which wasn't ideal with a day of meeting ahead of me (it didn't).
Aside from that, its a great hotel!
